markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> [_command_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1470), envision **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You cast [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1553) targeting yourself. In addition to the effects of the spell, visible primal energy surges over the armor for the duration. This has no mechanical impact.
name: command, envision
